Journal of Virtual Worlds Research publishes MPEG-V papers

Jan 2, 2012

The Journal of Virtual Worlds Research, Volume 4, Number 3 link here publishes a collection of papers about the MPEG-V standard which was co-developed by the Metaverse1 project. The papers are available for free download!
